datasets.name: daily_cost_trend
queryLines: SELECT usage_date, ROUND(SUM(total_cost_usd), 2) as daily_cost, ROUND(SUM(dbus), 2) as daily_dbus, COUNT(DISTINCT principal_email) as active_users, COUNT(DISTINCT cluster_id) as active_clusters FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.all_purpose_base GROUP BY usage_date ORDER BY usage_date

datasets.name: workspace_cost
queryLines: SELECT workspace_name, ROUND(SUM(total_cost_usd), 2) as total_cost, COUNT(DISTINCT principal_email) as user_count, COUNT(DISTINCT cluster_id) as cluster_count FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.all_purpose_base GROUP BY workspace_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC

datasets.name: executive_summary
queryLines:
WITH base_metrics AS (
              SELECT 
                ROUND(SUM(total_cost_usd), 2) as total_cost,
                COUNT(DISTINCT usage_date) as days_analyzed,
                COUNT(DISTINCT cluster_id) as total_clusters,
                COUNT(DISTINCT workspace_name) as total_workspaces,
                COUNT(DISTINCT principal_email) as total_users,
                COUNT(DISTINCT node_type) as total_instance_types,
                ROUND(SUM(total_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT principal_email), 2) as avg_cost_per_user,
                ROUND(SUM(total_cost_usd) / COUNT(DISTINCT cluster_id), 2) as avg_cost_per_cluster
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.all_purpose_base
            ),
            cluster_opp AS (
              SELECT 
                COUNT(*) as clusters_with_opp,
                SUM(CASE WHEN opportunity_priority = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical_clusters,
                SUM(CASE WHEN opportunity_priority = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high_clusters,
                ROUND(SUM(validated_savings), 2) as cluster_savings
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.cluster_opportunities
            ),
            instance_opp AS (
              SELECT 
                COUNT(*) as instances_with_opp,
                SUM(CASE WHEN opportunity_priority = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical_instances,
                SUM(CASE WHEN opportunity_priority = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high_instances,
                ROUND(SUM(validated_savings), 2) as instance_savings
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.instance_opportunities
            ),
            user_opp AS (
              SELECT 
                COUNT(*) as users_with_opp,
                ROUND(SUM(validated_savings), 2) as user_savings
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.user_opportunities
            ),
            avg_util AS (
              SELECT 
                ROUND(AVG(avg_cpu_pct), 0) as avg_cpu,
                ROUND(AVG(avg_mem_pct), 0) as avg_mem,
                ROUND(AVG(telemetry_coverage_pct), 0) as avg_telemetry
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.cluster_total_cost
            ),
            top_user AS (
              SELECT principal_email as top_user, ROUND(total_cost_usd, 2) as top_user_cost
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.user_total_cost
              ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC LIMIT 1
            ),
            top_cluster AS (
              SELECT cluster_name as top_cluster, ROUND(total_cost_usd, 2) as top_cluster_cost
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.cluster_total_cost
              ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC LIMIT 1
            ),
            top_instance AS (
              SELECT instance_type as top_instance, ROUND(total_cost_usd, 2) as top_instance_cost
              FROM ex_dash_temp.billing_forecast.instance_total_cost
              ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC LIMIT 1
            )
            SELECT 
              b.*,
              c.clusters_with_opp,
              c.critical_clusters,
              c.high_clusters,
              c.cluster_savings,
              i.instances_with_opp,
              i.critical_instances,
              i.high_instances,
              i.instance_savings,
              u.users_with_opp,
              u.user_savings,
              GREATEST(c.cluster_savings, i.instance_savings, u.user_savings) as max_savings,
              tu.top_user,
              tu.top_user_cost,
              tc.top_cluster,
              tc.top_cluster_cost,
              ti.top_instance,
              ti.top_instance_cost,
              av.avg_cpu,
              av.avg_mem,
              av.avg_telemetry,
              ROUND((GREATEST(c.cluster_savings, i.instance_savings, u.user_savings) / b.total_cost) * 100, 1) as savings_pct
            FROM base_metrics b, cluster_opp c, instance_opp i, user_opp u, avg_util av, top_user tu, top_cluster tc, top_instance ti
